headerDisplay: Thermometers are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories.

thermometerName.title: Name of your thermometer
thermometerName.description: This will be the name of your thermometer. This must be unique.

httpRoute.title: HTTP route
httpRoute.description:
This must be a path to a JSON format that looks like this, for example:
{
 "temp": "24.88",
 "temp2": "24.06",
 "temp3": "23.75"
}

updateInterval.title: Update interval (seconds)
updateInterval.description: Interval after which the values are updated.

jsonName.title: Name of your thermometer in JSON
jsonName.description:
This must be the name of the thermometer in JSON format.
In the case above it could be temp or temp2 or temp3.

calibration.title: Calibration (Â°C)
calibration.description: Only if you need to calibrate your thermometer. It will increase or decrease the value.
